scripts._build: npm run browserify; npm run cp; npm run readmes; npm run data:repo
scripts.cp:metadata: npm run cp:metadata:bower.json; npm run cp:metadata:package.json
scripts.data:repo: for repo in .software algebra algebra-group algebra-ring dflow flow-view games-of-life home iper Perl-Box-pm Sweet-Home-pm tris3d Task-BeLike-FIBO-pm vvvv-ChaosToys; do wget https://api.github.com/repos/fibo/$repo -O _data/repos/${repo}.json; done
scripts.readmes: for repo in .software gh-clone nz-util; do wget -nv https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fibo/$repo/master/README.md -O _projects/_readmes/${repo}-readme.md; cat _projects/$repo/index.yaml _projects/_readmes/${repo}-readme.md > _projects/$repo/index.md; done
